text: Hello, is it better to first  remove Julia 1.5x to install Julia 1.6? Thanks

elements.text: Hello, is it better to first  remove Julia 1.5x to install Julia 1.6? Thanks

text: I have the same question.. what will happen to our installed packages?

elements.text: I have the same question.. what will happen to our installed packages?

text: What do you mean by "what will happen to them"?

elements.text: What do you mean by "what will happen to them"?

text: No they won't. If you add Julia 1.6 you have to `]add` them again (or copy the Project.toml) and need to recompile then, but you don't have to download them again since they are already there. Then you can use the packages from both Julia installations.

elements.text: No they won't. If you add Julia 1.6 you have to
them again (or copy the Project.toml) and need to recompile then, but you don't have to download them again since they are already there. Then you can use the packages from both Julia installations.

text: Julia will never delete any packages, on the contrary, if you want to clear out some space you'll have to do `]gc` .
